ing: 1 fluid ounce pomegranate juice (such as POMÂ® Wonderful)
des: "Who says Halloween is just for kids? Enjoy this Halloween cocktail."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with crushed ice; add vodka, cranberry-apple juice, and pomegranate juice. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with apple slice and a small chip of dry ice for effect.
